nl.esciencecenter.octopus

Interface Octopus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OctopusEngine

    public interface Octopus
    Main interface to Octopus. Provides an acces point to all packages of Octopus, as well as some utility functions.
    Author:
    Niels Drost
